---
name: d3-platform
description: D3 platform-specific tool and configuration mappings for Copilot. Read this before executing D3 commands or skills.
---
# D3 Platform Reference

## Config File
The D3 config file is `.github/copilot-instructions.md`.

## Tool Mapping
| Reference | Tool |
|---|---|
| read tool | `read` |
| write tool | `edit` |
| search tool | `search` |
| glob tool | `search` |
| shell tool | `execute` |

## Skill Invocation
To invoke a skill, use this syntax:
```
/<skill-name> <arguments>
```
